main event: A Miami, Florida resident reported observing a bright, saucer-shaped object in the night sky on March 3, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as about the size of a silver dollar when held at arm's length, bright white in color with a bluish tint around the periphery.
The object was stationary for several minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing from view.
The total observation time was about 5 minutes, and the night was clear with unlimited visibility.
No sound was heard during the sighting.
The witness was found to be reliable and sincere in his report, and the investigator could not offer any conventional explanation for the phenomenon.
